root.name: Alien Highway: Encounter 2
root.description: PlotYou must pilot the 'Dalek' shaped robot deep into the heart of the aliens base in order to blow them up and save earth. The robot has to push a bomb all the way along the highway on the way to the base.Game PlayThe game is played from an isometric point of view. You control your robot with basic 'tank' controls. Rotate left or right, or move forwards. You also have a kind of gun, which can be used to move items like barrels around the scenery. You must battle your way through separate screens (no scrolling), avoiding enemies and using basic puzzle-solving to find a way past the many obstacles which stand in your way.
